extendedInfo.description: With the Take You There app, the TourismTouchscreen Network, found in quality accredited visitor information centres and i-Sites, is now always in your pocket! Join the millions of users who already access comprehensive information from across the international network. Discover attractions, restaurants, accommodation providers, and much much more. Take You There uses GPS information to display the destinations nearest to you first, or you can explore any of the thousands of network members within just a few touches! Whether travelling across town, within the region, throughout the state, to the other side of the country, or even internationally, Take You There has got you covered.-Free means free â no banner ads, no add-ons, no subscriptions.-Accessible, dependable, and user-friendly.-Integrated Maps and local weather.-Existing network of thousands of tourism operators with no unsolicited content.-Images always show the destination as it is â no surprises.-Local information displayed first with the option to view anywhere in the network.Start planning your trip with Take You There and get access to a wide and growing network of tourism information from thousands of contributors. Let us take you there, wherever âthereâ is!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load all content
reviews.comment: Does not load  images for destinations or weather icons. Blank screen despite audio.
reviews.author: Marty Payne

reviews.title: Found accommodation and no ads
reviews.comment: Love the new update. The phone direct feature is incredibly simple and intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Below par
reviews.comment: Not enough content... doesn\'t give enough information. Poorly designed. The ability to search using current location is great,  I am not sure how it will fair when out of coverage.
reviews.author: Sandro Hogan

reviews.title: GPS directions are brilliant
reviews.comment: Searched for things to do while I was on holidays and that\'s what I got. Delivers everything it promises.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great update
reviews.comment: Finally a listing app with more than just plain text and the same old images. Love the quick links to websites and phone numbers, though not every page has them.
reviews.author: Julian Mallett

reviews.title: Nice but..
reviews.comment: Android back button exits app. 5 stars when this is fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Found a great bar in Canberra CBD.
reviews.author: A Google User
